rice.p2p.util
Class SecurityUtils

java.lang.Object
  rice.p2p.util.SecurityUtils

public class SecurityUtils
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains a large number of static methods for performing security-related primitives, such as encrypt, decrypt, etc...

Version:
$Id: SecurityUtils.java 4167 2008-03-28 15:26:37Z jstewart $
Author:
amislove
